title: Historian on the American System - effect

content.question: The ideas described in the excerpt contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: A decline in the internal slave trade
Large-scale European immigration to the South
More Americans producing goods for national markets
Business leaders consolidating corporations into trusts and holding companies

content.answer: More Americans producing goods for national markets

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
